description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(146).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,290,0,-1).
formula: G.f.: (1 +12*x -x^2)/(x^4 -290*x^2 +1). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 14 2013a(n) = 290*a(n-2) - a(n-4). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 14 2013
mathematica: Denominator[Convergents[Sqrt[146], 30]] (* or *) CoefficientList[Series[(1 + 12 x - x^2)/(x^4 - 290 x^2 + 1), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 14 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1,12,289,3480]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 290*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 14 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
